original_title: Sri Lanka Set to Unleash Dushmantha Chameera against Oman
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka spearhead Dushmantha Chameera is set to make his first appearance in the ICC World Cup Qualifiers 2023 when Sri Lanka take on Oman on June 23.
The right arm quick missed out on the Islanders' opening win against United Arab Emirates through injury, but is now set to return to the Playing XI in place of Kasun Rajitha.
Oman on the hand, have had a stunning start to their campaign when they defeated a strong Irish team.
